languages.text: Небольшой алтарь. Центральное место отведено Друзу — почитаемому святому из соседнего сектора Каликсис, популярному также и в Просторе Коронус.

traits.locale_text: [draft] Небольшой алтарь с изображением святых империума, но это алтарь не был создан здесь, а привезен со священного мира [draft] Credos

languages.text: A small altar. The central spot has been given to Drusus — a saint from the neighbouring Calixis Sector who is widely revered in the Koronus Expanse.
languages.original_text: Небольшой алтарь. Центральное место отведено Друзу — почитаемому святому из соседнего сектора Каликсис, популярному также и в Просторе Коронус.

traits.locale_text: A small altar. The central spot has been given to Drusus — a Saint from the neighboring Calixis Sector whose worship is also widespread in Koronus.
A small altar. The central spot has been given to Drusus — a Saint from the neighboring Calixis Sector whose worship is also widespread in Koronus.
A small altar. The central spot has been given to Drusus — a saint from the neighbouring Calixis Sector who is worshipped throughout the Koronus Expanse.
A small altar. The central spot has been given to Drusus — a saint from the neighbouring Calixis Sector who is worshipped throughout the Koronus Expanse.
A small altar. The central spot has been given to Drusus — a saint from the neighbouring Calixis Sector who is widely revered in the Koronus Expanse.

languages.text: 这座小祭坛中间的位置雕刻着德鲁苏斯。这位圣人来自邻近的卡利西斯星区，在科罗努斯扩区广受尊敬。
languages.original_text: A small altar. The central spot has been given to Drusus — a saint from the neighbouring Calixis Sector who is widely revered in the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 这座小祭坛中间的位置雕刻着德鲁苏斯。这位圣人来自邻近的卡利西斯星区，在科罗努斯扩区广受尊敬。

languages.text: Un pequeño altar. En el centro se puede observar a Drusus, un santo del sector vecino, Calixis, que suscita devoción por todo lo largo y ancho de la Extensión de Koronus.
languages.original_text: A small altar. The central spot has been given to Drusus — a saint from the neighbouring Calixis Sector who is widely revered in the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Un pequeño altar. En el centro se puede observar a Drusus, un santo del sector vecino, Calixis, que suscita devoción por todo lo largo y ancho de la Extensión de Koronus».

languages.text: 小さな祭壇。真ん中にはドルススが描かれている。近隣のカリクシス星域出身の聖人で、コロヌス・エクスパンスで広く敬われている。
languages.original_text: A small altar. The central spot has been given to Drusus — a saint from the neighbouring Calixis Sector who is widely revered in the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 小さな祭壇。真ん中にはドルススが描かれている。近隣のカリクシス星域出身の聖人で、コロヌス・エクスパンスで広く敬われている。

languages.text: Ein kleiner Altar. Den Platz in der Mitte nimmt Drusus ein – ein Heiliger aus dem benachbarten Calixis-Sektor, der in der Koronus-Ausdehnung von vielen verehrt wird.
languages.original_text: A small altar. The central spot has been given to Drusus — a saint from the neighbouring Calixis Sector who is widely revered in the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Ein kleiner Altar. Den Platz in der Mitte nimmt Drusus ein – ein Heiliger aus dem benachbarten Calixis-Sektor, der in der Koronus-Ausdehnung von vielen verehrt wird.

languages.text: Un petit autel. En son centre, on peut admirer Drusus, un saint du secteur Calixis voisin, qui est particulièrement vénéré dans les Étendues de Koronus.
languages.original_text: A small altar. The central spot has been given to Drusus — a saint from the neighbouring Calixis Sector who is widely revered in the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Un petit autel. En son centre, on peut admirer Drusus, un saint du secteur Calixis voisin, qui est particulièrement vénéré dans les Étendues de Koronus.

languages.text: Küçük bir sunak. Tam ortasında Koronus Enginliği'nde kitlelerce saygıyla anılan ve komşu Calixis Sektörü'nden bir aziz olan Drusus yer alıyor.
languages.original_text: A small altar. The central spot has been given to Drusus — a saint from the neighbouring Calixis Sector who is widely revered in the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Küçük bir sunak. En ortada Drusus duruyor. Kendisi Koronus Enginliği'nde birçok kişi tarafından kutsal addedilen, komşu Calixis Sektörü'nden bir aziz.
